400.description: auto-generated light version of main brand color

600.description: main brand color of your project

700.description: auto-generated dark version of main brand color

400.description: auto-generated light version of additional brand color

600.description: additional brand color of your project

700.description: auto-generated dark version of additional brand color

body.description: the very basic underlying page background color

sheet.description: background color for drop, bottomsheet and modal

overlay.description: color for overlay behind modal and bottomsheet

toolbox.description: background color for Toolbox panel (left panel)

property-grid.description: background color for Property Grid panel (right panel)

tabs.description: background color for Tabs panel (top panel above all)

survey.description: surface color for the real Survey on the user's side

presets-manager.description: surface color for Presets Configuration Manager

dashboard.description: surface color for Dashboards on the user's side

json-editor.description: surface color for JSON Editor tab

embed-survey.description: surface color for Embed Survey tab

embed-creator.description: surface color for Embed Creator tab

default.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive and non-interactive elements located on surface, state: default

hovered.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive elements located on surface, state: hovered

pressed.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive elements located on surface, state: pressed

focused.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive elements located on surface, state: focused

disabled.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive elements located on surface, state: disabled

dragging.description: shadow (or border effect) color for interactive elements located on surface, state: dragging

default.description: shadow (or border effect) color for elevated elements, such as tooltip
shadow (or border effect) color for floating elements
